abilities.name: Beam Totem
about: Beam that damages enemies it touches

abilities.name: Sunder
about: Slams the ground, creating a wave of broken ground that damages enemies in an area in front of player

abilities.name: Slam
about: Strikes enemy foes down with a powerful blow

abilities.name: Invlunerability
about: Becomes invulnerable when encounter reaches 30% hp
Creates 5 totems that need to be destroyed in order to make encounter vulnerable again
